question: Veteran writer and conservationist Sugathakumari, who recently passed away, was from which state?
explanation:
Renowned Malayalam poet, conservationist and womenâ€™s rights activist Sugathakumari passed away at the age of 86.
The writer has released 15 collections of much-acclaimed poems. Sugathakumari was also the first chairperson of the Kerala State Women Commission and led the launch of Kudumbashree Missions. She had received various awards including the Padma Shri, the Saraswati Samman among others.
